mapper.sql: id, goodsPackName, goodsPackCode, typeId, typeName, totalPrice, state, num, createdBy, createTime, lastUpdateTime
mapper.insert:
insert into goods_pack
id,
goodsPackName,
goodsPackCode,
typeId,
typeName,
totalPrice,
state,
num,
createdBy,
createTime,
lastUpdateTime,
note,

mapper.update:
update goods_pack
goodsPackName = #{goodspackname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsPackCode = #{goodspackcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
typeId = #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
typeName = #{typename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastUpdateTime = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
note = #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update goods_pack set goodsPackName = #{goodspackname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsPackCode = #{goodspackcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, typeId = #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, typeName = #{typename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastUpdateTime = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, note = #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update goods_pack set goodsPackName = #{goodspackname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsPackCode = #{goodspackcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, typeId = #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, typeName = #{typename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastUpdateTime = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from goods_pack,goods_pack_affiliated where goodsInfoId = #{goodsinfoid} and goods_pack.id = goods_pack_affiliated.goodsPackId

select count(1) from goods_pack
and goodsPackName like concat('%',#{goodspackname},'%')
and typeId like concat('%',#{typeid},'%')
and state like concat('%',#{state},'%')

select * from goods_pack
and goodsPackName like concat('%',#{goodspackname},'%')
and typeId like concat('%',#{typeid},'%')
and state like concat('%',#{state},'%')
order by lastUpdateTime desc limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
